statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); project_name=$(basename "$cwd"); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null; git_branch=""; git_status=""; git_color=""; if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then git_branch=$(git --no-optional-locks symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo "detached"); if [ -n "$(git --no-optional-locks status --porcelain 2>/dev/null)" ]; then git_color="\\033[33m"; git_status="âœ—"; else local_commit=$(git --no-optional-locks rev-parse @ 2>/dev/null); remote_commit=$(git --no-optional-locks rev-parse @{u} 2>/dev/null); if [ "$local_commit" != "$remote_commit" ] && [ -n "$remote_commit" ]; then git_color="\\033[36m"; git_status="â†•"; else git_color="\\033[32m"; git_status="âœ“"; fi; fi; fi; printf "\\033[35mğŸ“ %s\\033[0m  \\033[34mğŸ“‚ %s\\033[0m" "$project_name" "$cwd"; if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then printf "  %bğŸŒ¿ %s %s\\033[0m" "$git_color" "$git_branch" "$git_status"; fi; printf "  \\033[90mğŸ¤– %s\\033[0m" "$model_name"
